diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $DBA$ is $28$ degrees.
The length of the line $DA$ is $12$ units.
The measure of angle $ADB$ is $40$ degrees.
The length of the line $DA$ is equal to the length of the line $BC$.
The length of the line $BC$ is equal to the length of the line $CD$.
line_instances: There are lines $BA$, $BC$, $DA$, and $DB$, forming quadrilateral $ABCD$.
